titleStmt.title: The case of the bankers and their creditors stated and examined by the rules of lawes, policy, and common reason, as it was inclosed in a letter to a friend / by a true lover of his King and country, and a sufferer for loyalty.
titleStmt.author: Turner, Thomas, d. 1679.
